unit_summary: This module provides a comprehensive introduction to web development, covering the fundamental concepts of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
learning_objectives: Understand the basic structure of the web
Learn the fundamentals of HTML markup
Grasp the basics of CSS styling
learning_outcomes: Create a simple web page using HTML

unit_summary: Learn how to create websites that work well on all devices, from desktop computers to mobile phones, using responsive design techniques.
learning_objectives: Understand the concept of responsive design
Learn about media queries in CSS
learning_outcomes: Create responsive layouts that adapt to different screen sizes
Implement media queries for device-specific styling
Design websites with mobile users in mind

unit_summary: A deep dive into JavaScript programming, covering variables, functions, objects, arrays, and control structures.
learning_objectives: Understand JavaScript syntax and data types

unit_summary: Introduction to React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, focusing on components, props, and state.
learning_outcomes: Pass data between components using props

unit_summary: Learn the basics of Next.js, a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation for React applications.
learning_objectives: Understand server-side rendering and static generation
learning_outcomes: Create a Next.js application from scratch
Fetch data using getStaticProps and getServerSideProps

unit_summary: Learn how to integrate external APIs into your web applications, handling authentication, data fetching, and error handling.
learning_objectives: Learn about HTTP methods and status codes
learning_outcomes: Create a web application that uses third-party data

unit_summary: Introduction to database design principles, focusing on relational databases, normalization, and SQL queries.
Learn the principles of user experience design, focusing on usability, accessibility, and user-centered design methodologies.
